Package com.epam.services

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
UserService interface contains methods to interact with user data and perform business logic.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

  • Method Details

    • login

      UserDTO login(String login, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, UserServiceException
      Verifies the user's credentials and returns the UserDTO of the user if the user exists.
      Parameters:
      login - The user's login name.
      password - The user's password.
      Returns:
      The UserDTO of the user with the given credentials.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user with the given credentials does not exist.
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • registerUser

      void registerUser(UserForm userForm) throws UserAlreadyExistException, UserServiceException
      Registers a new user by taking the user form and adding the user to the DAO layer. Sends a random password to the user's email.
      Parameters:
      userForm - The user form containing all necessary information to add a new subscriber. The form is not validated.
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistException - If the user is already in the persistent layer.
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • getAllSubscribers

      List<UserDTO> getAllSubscribers() throws UserServiceException
      Returns all subscribers from the persistent layer.
      Returns:
      A list of all subscribers from the persistent layer.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • getAllUnblockedSubscribers

      List<UserDTO> getAllUnblockedSubscribers() throws UserServiceException
      Returns all unblocked subscribers from the persistent layer.
      Returns:
      A list of all unblocked subscribers from the persistent layer.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • getSubscriberForCharging

      List<UserDTO> getSubscriberForCharging() throws UserServiceException
      Returns all unblocked subscribers from the persistent layer with tariffs that have 0 days until next payment.
      Returns:
      A list of all unblocked subscribers from the persistent layer with tariffs that have 0 days until next payment.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • viewSubscribers

      List<UserDTO> viewSubscribers(String searchField, int page, int entriesPerPage) throws UserServiceException
      Returns a filtered and sorted list of UserDTO based on the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      searchField - The sortable field as a string (e.g. "name", "rate").
      page - The page number to view, starting from 1.
      entriesPerPage - The number of records per page.
      Returns:
      A list of UserDTO matching the specified sorting and filtering parameters.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer.

    • getUserById

      UserDTO getUserById(int userId) throws UserNotFoundException, UserServiceException
      This method returns the user with a specific id.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id to get.
      Returns:
      a UserDTO object representing the user information.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - is thrown when the user with this id does not exist.
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something goes wrong in the DAO layer.

    • getUserBalance

      BigDecimal getUserBalance(int userId) throws UserServiceException
      This method returns the balance of the user with specific user id.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id to get the balance of.
      Returns:
      a BigDecimal object representing the user's balance.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something goes wrong in the DAO layer.

    • getUserStatus

      boolean getUserStatus(int userId) throws UserServiceException
      This method checks the blocked status of the user with specific user id.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id to check the blocked status of.
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the user's blocked status. True if the user is blocked, false if unblocked.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something goes wrong in the DAO layer.

    • getSubscribersNumber

      int getSubscribersNumber(String searchField) throws UserServiceException
      This method returns the number of subscribers that contain a specific text in their login.
      Parameters:
      searchField - the text to search in the subscriber's login.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of subscribers that contain the specified text in their login.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something goes wrong in the DAO layer.

    • removeUser

      void removeUser(int userId) throws UserServiceException
      This method removes the user with a specific id from the persistent layer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to remove.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something goes wrong in the DAO layer.

    • changeUserStatus

      void changeUserStatus(boolean blocked, int id) throws UserServiceException
      This method changes the status of a user.
      Parameters:
      blocked - the new status of the user. True if blocked, false if unblocked.
      id - the id of the user to change the status of.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something goes wrong in the DAO layer.

    • changeUserBalance

      void changeUserBalance(int userId, BigDecimal difference, String description) throws UserServiceException, NegativeUserBalanceException
      This method changes the balance of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to change the balance of.
      difference - the difference by which to change the balance.
      description - a description of the transaction.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something goes wrong in the DAO layer.
      NegativeUserBalanceException - is thrown when the user's balance will become negative after the transaction.

    • chargeUserForTariffsUsing

      void chargeUserForTariffsUsing(int userId, List<TariffDTO> unpaidTariffs) throws UserServiceException, NegativeUserBalanceException
      Charges the user a fee for using the specified tariffs.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user to be charged
      unpaidTariffs - List of Tariffs that the user needs to pay for
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer
      NegativeUserBalanceException - If the user's balance will become negative after the transaction

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(int userId, String currentPassword, String newPassword) throws UserServiceException, UserNotFoundException, PasswordNotMatchException
      Changes the user's password.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user whose password is being changed
      currentPassword - The current password of the user
      newPassword - The new password for the user
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer
      UserNotFoundException - If a user with the specified ID does not exist
      PasswordNotMatchException - If the current password is incorrect

    • resetPassword

      void resetPassword(String email) throws UserServiceException
      Resets the user's password to a random one and sends the new password to the provided email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user whose password will be reset
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer

    • addTariffToUser

      void addTariffToUser(int userId, int tariffId) throws UserAlreadyHasTariffException, UserServiceException, NegativeUserBalanceException
      Records that a user has a specified tariff.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user who will be added to the tariff
      tariffId - ID of the tariff that will be added to the user
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyHasTariffException - If a record with the specified user ID and tariff ID already exists
      UserServiceException - If an error occurs in the DAO layer
      NegativeUserBalanceException - If the user does not have enough balance to pay for the first tariff period

    • removeTariffFromUser

      void removeTariffFromUser(int userId, int tariffId) throws UserServiceException
      This method removes record about user has tariff.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user.
      tariffId - id of the tariff.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.
